name: ComMoonication IntEarthference
description:
Known issues: 

- Chat doesn't automatically scroll to bottom (it did, but then messed to itch.io, so the feature was removed) 

- Some messages get lost in the server. Even more intEarthference! 

- Sometimes one of the players ends up not getting the ending screen :(

(previous issues caused by my free tier Heroku hosting server) 

In case you are experiencing any other issue, you can try playing here: https://moonshot-client.netlify.app/

The new fully working build will be released after the voting phase (Game developed for GitHub Game Off)

Source code is available in these two repositories:

- https://github.com/ildede/moonshot-client
- https://github.com/ildede/moonshot-server-spring

Some minutes after the due date a better build was uploaded to fix a partial blocker occurring when playing here on itch.io, the commit that "fixes" is here: https://github.com/ildede/moonshot-client/commit/960fa8e9aa26adc3de7ca987185786f...
Sorry for the inconvenient.
